thread.title: Hunt for killer of man found in Melbourne car park with slit throat
thread.title_full: Hunt for killer of man found in Melbourne car park with slit throat

title: Hunt for killer of man found in Melbourne car park with slit throat
text:
Share Melbourne murderer still at large - Yahoo7 The killer responsible for the death of a 36-year-old man found at a major Melbourne shopping centre car park is still at large. Close Hunt for a killer after body found at Doncaster shopping centre UP NEXT VIDEO Hunt for a killer after body found at Doncaster shopping centre. Source: Seven News Hunt for a killer after body found at Doncaster shopping centre 
Victoria Police confirmed on Sunday night the Doncaster man's identity has not yet been released, and that no suspects have yet been apprehended or arrested. 
A witness said the man's throat was slashed, but police have only confirmed the man suffered "serious head injuries". The killer of a man who had his throat slashed in a Melbourne car park has not yet been apprehended. Picture: 7 News 
The victim was found by members of the public near the lift lobby at a Doncaster shopping centre car park at about 6.10am on Friday. 
Forensic investigators scoured the scene in the car park of Westfield Doncaster on Friday after the man was discovered by a fitness group holding a nearby training session. 
Members of the Heavy Haulers group attempted to help the man after spotting him near the lift lobby, but he was unable to be revived and died soon after. The Westfield Doncaster car park was closed on Friday as homicide squad and forensic investigators searched the scene. Source: 7 News Blood trails were marked and photographed by police. Source: 7 News 
A witness earlier told 3AW there was a lot of blood and it appeared the man had his throat slashed. 
Police are appealing for anyone who may have seen anything suspicious at the top level of the car park or in the lift lobby to come forward. 
Anyone with information is encouraged to call Crime Stoppers 1800 333 000 or use the Crime Stoppers online reporting page .
